author: Will Canny
title: Bitcoin Miner Price Targets Raised to Reflect Improved Industry Economics: JPMorgan
description: The bank increased its CleanSpark, Riot Platforms and MARA Holdings price targets.
content:
JPMorgan (JPM) raised its price targets for a number of bitcoin 
 mining companies to reflect first-quarter results and changes to the bitcoin price and the network hashrate, the bank said in a repo… [+909 chars]
